p: As an inhibitor of CYP3A4 and UGT1A1 and a strong inhibitor of OATP1B1, atazanavir may increase the plasma concentrations of other drugs such as proton-pump inhibitors, antacids, and H2-receptor antagonists. Statins such as simvastatin and atorvastatin are also known as CYP3A4 isoenzyme substrates [ 16].
